item.description:
Liberate yourself at the event of the summer – Ova4D’s speed dating and dance in conjunction with Blush Boston.

For singles: Join us an hour early and liberate yourself from those dull, boring, dateless Saturday nights. Meet the woman of your dreams, a summer fling, or just dance with friends.

Couples: come after the speed dating and liberate yourselves from the mundane routine of the week by dancing the night away under the stars.

We’ll be at Anthony’s in Malden at 7:00 for speed dating, and headed to their beautiful, spacious outdoor area for dancing at 8:00.

The cost is a mere $10 for the speed dating plus dancing, including light munchies; and $7.00 for the dancing only.

As always, food and beverage are available for purchase at the outdoor patio.

On a beautiful Saturday evening, what have you got to lose?
item.name: Bastille Day Ova4D/Blush Boston dance and Speed dating
